description:
Ritsu and few others accept Mizuguchi Marie`s invitation to the marine resort, Sea Paraiso, within Mobius. The group is enjoying the various attractions when Aria suddenly says, "I think she saw me!" even though she`s supposed to be invisible to normal people.
The girl in question is so beautiful that she`s surrounded by men at the park, and when Ritsu goes to try and talk to her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daredemo Kizutsuku Koto wa Aru. Daga, Kizutsuite Iru Koto ni Kizukanai Mono wa Iyasarenai.
Everyone Gets Hurt. But Those Who Don`t Realize They`re Hurting Can`t Be Healed.
Nous sommes tous blessés. Il faut s`en rendre compte pour être soignés.
誰でも傷つくことはある. だが, 傷ついていることに気付かない者は癒やされない.
